title: Selena Gomez heads to Niall Horan's house with bag full of groceries amid romance rumors
text:
They sparked renewed interest in their relationship after he was seen with his arm around her following a group dinner last Thursday.

And Selena Gomez was spotted heading to Niall Horan's house in Los Angeles that same weekend.

The actress, 27, carried a bag full of groceries with her as she approached the property on Saturday.

Get together: Selena Gomez was spotted heading to Niall Horan's house in Los Angeles on Saturday amid romance rumors

Selena was dressed down for the occasion, sporting denim cutoffs, a white sweatshirt, and Louis Vuitton purse over her shoulder.

Selena and Niall are long-time friends who have previously been at the center of romance rumors.

The speculation was reignited last week, after Niall was seen in an Instagram snap with his arm wrapped around her shoulders during a group dinner.

Insiders insist there's nothing romantic going on between the pair.

Home sweet home: Gomez was pictured arriving to Horan's picturesque home

Dinner with friends: The speculation was reignited over the weekend, after Niall was seen in an Instagram snap with his arm wrapped around her shoulders during a group dinner

'Selena and Niall are not dating and have been hanging out as friends,' a source told E!. 'They have always been good friends and have kept in touch throughout the years.'

The pair have been communicating with each other on Instagram.

On the night of the group dinner, Selena gave Niall and his new song Nice To Meet Ya a shout-out on her Instagram stories.

Interesting...: Horan posed beside a giant picture of Gomez on his Instagram stories on Wednesday

On Wednesday, Niall posted an Instagram story of himself posing alongside a giant image of Selena.

'Hello there Sel,' he wrote, tagging the artist.

Four years earlier the pairing were romantically linked after reportedly putting on a PDA packed display at Jenna Dewan's birthday party.

New tunes! On the night of the group dinner, Selena gave Niall and his new song Nice To Meet Ya a shout-out on Instagram

The pair were spotted kissing, dancing, and hugging at the bash, sources told E! at the time.

However Selena shut down they were anything more than friends not long after.

'Oh my god, no,' she told ET Online of the romance rumors. 'I love him, I always have. He's amazing.'

Steamy display: Four years earlier the pairing were romantically linked after reportedly putting on a PDA packed display at Jenna Dewan's birthday party (pictured October 2019)

Selena's most recent outing with Niall comes not long after her ex-boyfriend Justin Bieber tied the knot for a second time with Hailey Bieber in South Carolina.

For years, Selena and Justin had an on-again, off-again relationship, that ended for good last year, just before he reconnected with Hailey.

Niall, meanwhile, had previously been linked to Ellie Goulding and Hailee Steinfeld.

News broke the singer called it quits with Hailee after a year together in 2018, though neither party ever publicly confirmed the romance.
description: The actress, 27, carried a bag full of groceries with her as she approached the property. Selena was dressed down for the occasion, sporting jean cut-offs, and a white sweatshirt.
